Ninja Notes Companion App - Marketing Brief

Executive Summary

We're launching a game-changing feature that transforms our already unique bot-free recording experience from a multi-step process into a single click. This positions us as the simplest AND most private meeting recording solution on the market.

The Feature in Simple Terms

Think of it as a tiny helper that lives quietly on your computer. Once installed (takes 30 seconds), users never have to think about HOW to record again - they just hit RECORD in Ninja Notes and it works. No more screen sharing setup, no more audio selection, no more confusion between Mac and PC differences.

The Before & After Story

BEFORE (Current State):

*	User wants to record a meeting
*	Opens Ninja Notes
*	Initiates Chrome screen share
*	Selects correct tab or screen
*	Ensures "Share system audio" is checked
*	Navigates different steps for Mac vs PC
*	Finally starts recording

AFTER (With Companion App):

*	User wants to record a meeting
*	Opens Ninja Notes
*	Clicks RECORD
*	Done.

Value Propositions:

1.	Radically Simple: From 6 steps to 1 step

2.	Set It & Forget It: Install once, works forever
